  • 所有程序包

类分层结构

  • java.lang.Object
    • weka.experiment.AveragingResultProducer (implements weka.core.AdditionalMeasureProducer, weka.core.OptionHandler, weka.experiment.ResultListener, weka.experiment.ResultProducer, weka.core.RevisionHandler)
    • weka.experiment.ClassifierSplitEvaluator (implements weka.core.AdditionalMeasureProducer, weka.core.OptionHandler, weka.core.RevisionHandler, weka.experiment.SplitEvaluator)
      • weka.experiment.CostSensitiveClassifierSplitEvaluator
    • weka.experiment.CrossValidationResultProducer (implements weka.core.AdditionalMeasureProducer, weka.core.OptionHandler, weka.experiment.ResultProducer, weka.core.RevisionHandler)
    • weka.experiment.CSVResultListener (implements weka.core.OptionHandler, weka.experiment.ResultListener, weka.core.RevisionHandler)
      • weka.experiment.InstancesResultListener
    • weka.experiment.DatabaseUtils (implements weka.core.RevisionHandler, java.io.Serializable)
      • weka.experiment.DatabaseResultListener (implements weka.experiment.ResultListener)
        • weka.experiment.DatabaseResultProducer (implements weka.core.AdditionalMeasureProducer, weka.core.OptionHandler, weka.experiment.ResultProducer)
      • weka.experiment.InstanceQuery (implements weka.core.OptionHandler)
    • weka.experiment.DensityBasedClustererSplitEvaluator (implements weka.core.AdditionalMeasureProducer, weka.core.OptionHandler, weka.core.RevisionHandler, weka.experiment.SplitEvaluator)
    • weka.experiment.Experiment (implements weka.core.OptionHandler, weka.core.RevisionHandler, java.io.Serializable)
      • weka.experiment.RemoteExperiment
    • weka.experiment.LearningRateResultProducer (implements weka.core.AdditionalMeasureProducer, weka.core.OptionHandler, weka.experiment.ResultListener, weka.experiment.ResultProducer, weka.core.RevisionHandler)
    • weka.experiment.OutputZipper (implements weka.core.RevisionHandler)
    • weka.experiment.PairedStats (implements weka.core.RevisionHandler)
      • weka.experiment.PairedStatsCorrected
    • weka.experiment.PairedTTester (implements weka.core.OptionHandler, weka.core.RevisionHandler, weka.experiment.Tester)
      • weka.experiment.PairedCorrectedTTester (implements weka.core.TechnicalInformationHandler)
    • weka.experiment.PropertyNode (implements weka.core.RevisionHandler, java.io.Serializable)
    • weka.experiment.RandomSplitResultProducer (implements weka.core.AdditionalMeasureProducer, weka.core.OptionHandler, weka.experiment.ResultProducer, weka.core.RevisionHandler)
    • weka.experiment.RegressionSplitEvaluator (implements weka.core.AdditionalMeasureProducer, weka.core.OptionHandler, weka.core.RevisionHandler, weka.experiment.SplitEvaluator)
    • weka.experiment.RemoteExperimentEvent (implements java.io.Serializable)
    • weka.experiment.RemoteExperimentSubTask (implements weka.core.RevisionHandler, weka.experiment.Task)
    • java.rmi.server.RemoteObject (implements java.rmi.Remote, java.io.Serializable)
      • java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
        • java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
          • weka.experiment.RemoteEngine (implements weka.experiment.Compute, weka.core.RevisionHandler)
    • weka.experiment.ResultMatrix (implements weka.core.RevisionHandler, java.io.Serializable)
      • weka.experiment.ResultMatrixCSV
      • weka.experiment.ResultMatrixGnuPlot
